text: Altererythrobacter sediminis is a Gram-negative, non-spore-forming and non- motile bacterium from the genus of Altererythrobacter which has been isolated from lagoon sediments from the coast of Korea. == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Altererythrobacter sediminis at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Sphingomonadales Category:Bacteria described in 2016
title: Altererythrobacter sediminis
